title: "Week 7: ETS models"

## What you will learn this week

* Exponential smoothing with seasonality
* Automatic model selection using the AICc

## Pre-class activities

Read [Sections 8.3-8.4 and 8.6-8.7 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos

## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial)

Complete Exercises 7, 10-15 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html).

<!-- [**Solutions to Exercises**](ex7-sol.qmd) -->
